Text: Sorry for being a n00b, guys, but what is this? Is this gonna make me safer on XBox Live or what?
AGBX stealth patches games so that you can play them on XBOX Live
Yes, I know that but, ehm, I use ABGX everytime I'm going to burn XBox 360 games and it works flawlessly so why do I need to download this?
different games have different "waves" most common Wave 4,6, & 9. AGBX only comes stock with Waves 1-4.
